0.text: Innate - Style: Samira's damaging basic attacks and abilities against at least one enemy  champion different from the previous damaging hit made against champions grant her a Style stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. The duration refreshes on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities against enemy champions.

1.text: Samira gains 0% − 21% (based on Style stacks)  bonus movement speed.

2.text: Innate: Samira's basic attacks against targets in  200 range use her blade, becoming  non-projectile. Basic attacks  on-hit with the blade and  Blade Whirl,  Wild Rush, and the slash and explosives of  Flair deal 2 − 19 (based on level) (+ 3.5% − 10.5% (based on level) AD) bonus magic damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

3.text: Whenever Samira uses a basic attack against an  immobilized target, the attack is empowered to have an  uncancelable windup, be modified to deal the attack's damage over 6 strikes in 0.5 seconds, and cause Samira to  dash into her  attack range from the target if they are nearby, though not through terrain. If the target is a  monster or is  airborne, the attack also  knocks them up for 0.5 seconds.

4.text: The empowered attack  resets Samira's basic attack timer, is affected by  critical strike modifiers, applies  on-hit effects only once, and cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Samira fires a shot in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits.

1.text: If a targetable enemy is in front of Samira at the time of starting the cast, she will slash with her blade in a cone instead, dealing the same damage to all enemies within.

2.text: Casting Flair during  Wild Rush will cause Samira to deploy explosives along her path which detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies within the covered distance. This can be done while performing  Blade Whirl or  Inferno Trigger despite Flair being disabled during them.(note)

3.text: Flair can  critically strike for (25% +  35%) bonus physical damage and both the shot and slash apply  life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Samira spins her blades around herself over 0.75 seconds, destroying all hostile non- turret  projectiles that enter or are created within the area for the duration.

1.text: Samira slashes twice during Blade Whirl, each one dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies. The first slash occurs immediately and the second one occurs at the end of the duration.

2.text: Samira cannot attack nor cast  Flair during Blade Whirl. Casting  Inferno Trigger will end Blade Whirl early.

0.text: Active: Samira  dashes in the direction of the target enemy or enemy  structure, slashing all enemies within her path to deal them magic damage and gain  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

1.text: Takedowns on enemy  champions within 3 seconds of being damaged by Samira reset Wild Rush's  cooldown.

2.text: Samira can cast  Flair or  Inferno Trigger during Wild Rush. Using  Blade Whirl will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.

0.text: Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons for 2.277 seconds, reducing her movement speed by 30% and rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies over 2.013 seconds at sporadic times in 0.2-second intervals each, dealing physical damage with each shot, reduced by 75% against  minions.

1.text: Each shot can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) bonus physical damage and applies  life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.

2.text: Inferno Trigger cannot be cast unless at maximum   Style stacks (6), and all stacks will be consumed at the end of the effect. A nearby  visible enemy is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be shot at.

3.text: Samira cannot attack nor cast  Flair and  Blade Whirl during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of  interrupting  crowd control as well as  disarm.

0.text: Samira's taunt  prevents her from inputting attack commands and casting non-movement abilities, and she may only interrupt it herself with a movement command. After 3 seconds without interruption, she will toss a  coin in the direction she is facing.

1.text: If she has at least  1, the coin deals   1 true damage to the first enemy champion hit, triggering  Daredevil Impulse but granting them  1 of Samira's gold.

2.text: If cast within 1100 range of a  visible enemy champion, Samira will turn to face towards the closest one to perform the animation.

3.text: Samira's Taunt can target and hit dead enemy champions, granting them  1 but not triggering other effects.

Active: Samira  dashes in the direction of the target enemy or enemy  structure, slashing all enemies within her path to deal them magic damage and gain  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons for 2.277 seconds, reducing her movement speed by 30% and rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies over 2.013 seconds at sporadic times in 0.2-second intervals each, dealing physical damage with each shot, reduced by 75% against  minions.
